entry.string: You have no permission to modify #(1) item #(2)
entry.translation: Yuoo hefe-a nu permeessiun tu mudeeffy #(1) item #(2)

entry.string: This is the allowed HTML that this website has configured.
entry.translation: Thees is zee ellooed HTML thet thees vebseete-a hes cunffeegoored. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Note: when you create a new publication type, the articles module will automatically use the templates user-display-[publicationtype].xd and user-summary-[publicationtype].xd. If those templates do not exist when you try to preview or display a new article, you'll get this warning :-)
entry.translation: Nute-a: vhee yuoo creete-a a noo poobleeceshun type-a, zee erteecles mudoole-a veell ootumeteecelly use-a zee templetes ooser-deespley-[poobleeceshuntype-a].xd und ooser-soommery-[poobleeceshuntype-a].xd. Iff thuse-a templetes du nut ixeest vhee yuoo try tu prefeeoo oor deespley a noo erteecle-a, yuoo'll get thees verneeng :-)

entry.string: Click on a tab to display articles from that publication type
entry.translation: Cleeck oon a teb tu deespley erteecles frum thet poobleeceshun type

entry.string: Click on a tab to explore further
entry.translation: Cleeck oon a teb tu ixplure-a foorzeer

entry.string: Enter the number of items that you wish to display.
entry.translation: Enter zee noomber ooff items thet yuoo veesh tu deespley. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Choose the publication type for the featured items.
entry.translation: Chuuse-a zee poobleeceshun type-a fur zee feetoored items. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Choose the category for the featured items.
entry.translation: Chuuse-a zee cetegury fur zee feetoored items.

entry.string: Choose the status (e.g. Approved, Front Page) for the featured items.
entry.translation: Chuuse-a zee stetoos (i.g. Epprufed, Frunt Pege-a) fur zee feetoored items.

entry.string: If you wish to give the article an alternative title to be displayed as a featured item, enter the name here.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo veesh tu geefe-a zee erteecle-a un elterneteefe-a teetle-a tu be-a deespleyed es a feetoored item, inter zee neme-a here-a.

entry.string: If you wish to show the summary for the article as teaser text select this box.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo veesh tu shoo zee soommery fur zee erteecle-a es teeser text select thees bux.

entry.string: If you wish to give the article an alternative summary to be displayed as a featured item, enter the summary here.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo veesh tu geefe-a zee erteecle-a un elterneteefe-a soommery tu be-a deespleyed es a feetoored item, inter zee soommery here-a.

entry.string: Select this if you wish to show the dynamic data that you have included for your publication types.
entry.translation: Select thees iff yuoo veesh tu shoo zee dynemeec deta thet yuoo hefe-a inclooded fur yuoor poobleeceshun types.
